Task.Name: Load-TransformCarrier
Task.Sql: INSERT INTO dbo.TransformUnitedHealthCareSchedule ( [Fname] ,[Area] ,[Code] ,[Modifier] ,[Remark] ,[TypeOfService] ,[PlaceOfService] ,[Amount] ,[StartDate] ,[EndDate] ) SELECT i.[Fname] ,Area = 'All' ,i.[Code] ,i.[Modifier] ,i.[Remark] ,i.[TypeOfService] ,[PlaceOfService] = CASE WHEN i.PlaceOfService = 'NonFacility' THEN 'Clinic' WHEN i.PlaceOfService = 'Facility' THEN 'Hospital' END ,i.[Amount] ,i.[StartDate] ,i.[EndDate] FROM dbo.ImportUnitedHealthCareSchedule i LEFT JOIN [dbo].[TransformUnitedHealthCareSchedule] t ON i.Code = t.code AND isnull(i.Modifier,1) = isnull(t.Modifier,1) AND i.Amount = t.amount and i.StartDate = t.StartDate AND i.EndDate = t.EndDate WHERE t.recordid IS NULL

Task.Name: Load SourceScheduleData
Task.Sql:
---Delete replaced records from source schedule data DELETE FROM dbo.SourceScheduleData WHERE RecordID IN ( SELECT tt.RecordID FROM ( SELECT indx = row_number() OVER ( PARTITION BY code ,placeOfService ,area ,modifier ORDER BY StartDate DESC ) ,t.RecordID FROM dbo.TransformUnitedHealthCareSchedule t ) tt LEFT JOIN dbo.SourceScheduleData s ON tt.RecordID = s.RecordID WHERE tt.indx > 1 )
------Insert new replacement records INSERT INTO dbo.sourcescheduledata ( code ,Modifier ,PlaceOfService ,Amount ,StartDate ,EndDate ,Area ,ScheduleName ,RecordID ) SELECT tt.code ,tt.modifier ,tt.PlaceOfService ,tt.Amount ,tt.StartDate ,tt.EndDate ,tt.Area ,tt.ScheduleName ,tt.RecordID FROM ( SELECT indx = row_number() OVER ( PARTITION BY code ,placeOfService ,area ,modifier ORDER BY StartDate DESC ) ,t.code ,t.modifier ,t.PlaceOfService ,t.Amount ,t.StartDate ,t.EndDate ,t.Area ,ScheduleName = 'UnitedHealthCare-Fixed-Clinic' ,t.RecordID FROM dbo.TransformUnitedHealthCareSchedule t ) tt left join dbo.SourceScheduleData s on tt.RecordID = s.RecordID WHERE tt.indx = 1 and s.RecordID is null
